title: Does the Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra support 5G? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes you should buy Samsung galaxy s20 ultra 5G because the specifications of the device is very good you can see the specification below. Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra 5G is an upcoming smartphone by Samsung. The phone is rumoured to come with a 6.90-inch touchscreen display with a resolution of 1440x3200 pixels at a pixel density of 511 pixels per inch (ppi) and an aspect ratio of 20:9. The Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra 5G is rumoured to run Android 10 and is expected to be powered by a 5000mAh battery. As far as the cameras are concerned, the Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra 5G is rumoured to pack a 108-megapixel primary camera; a second 48-megapixel camera and a third 12-megapixel camera. It is expected to sport a 40-megapixel camera on the front for selfies. The Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra 5G runs One UI 2.0 based on Android 10 and packs 128GB of inbuilt storage that can be expanded via microSD card (up to 1000GB). The Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra 5G tipped to be a dual-SIM (GSM) smartphone that will accept Nano-SIMsmartphone. Connectivity options on the Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra 5G are said to include Wi-Fi, GPS, Wi-Fi Direct, 3G, and 4G. Sensors on the phone are rumoured to include accelerometer, proximity sensor, and compass/ magnetometer. The Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra 5G is said to measure 167.00 x 76.00 x 8.80mm (height x width x thickness) and weighs 221.00 grams.
